name: writeSingleBlock(requestFlags:blockNumber:dataBlock:completionHandler:)
desc: Sends the Write Single Block command (0x21 command code), as defined in the ISO 15693-3 specification, to the tag.Required.
declaration:
func writeSingleBlock(requestFlags flags: NFCISO15693RequestFlag, 
          blockNumber: UInt8, 
            dataBlock: Data, 
    completionHandler: @escaping (Error?) -> Void)
